Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (e)?
Correct Answer Message: La frase richiede l’inserimento di un relativo che, appunto, metta in relazione "people" con "voices". Tra le due parole c'è una relazione di appartenenza, perciò l'aggettivo relativo da inserire è "whose" (la traduzione è infatti "quelle persone là fuori la cui voce" etc.)
Subject: Inglese

Question:
“Sons of Gondor! Of Rohan! My brothers. I see in your eyes the same fear that (a)…… take the heart of me. A day (b)…. come when the courage of Men fails, when we forsake our friends and break all bonds of fellowship, but it is not this day. An hour of (c)….. and shattered shields when the Age of Men comes crashing down, but it is not this day! This day we (d)…..! (e) …… all that you hold dear on this good earth, I bid you stand, Men of the West!” (Da Il Signore degli Anelli - Il Ritorno del Re, 2004, Peter Jackson) 
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (a)?
Correct Answer Message: Il contesto della frase proposta necessita, infatti, di un verbo modale, in questo caso “would”. La A e la C non possono essere corrette perché dovrebbero essere seguite da un participio passato, ma nella frase compare la forma base del verbo "take".
Subject: Inglese

Question:
“Sons of Gondor! Of Rohan! My brothers. I see in your eyes the same fear that (a)…… take the heart of me. Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (b)?
Correct Answer Message: Tra le seguenti opzioni, “may” è il modale corretto da inserire per indicare una possibilità nel futuro.
Subject: Inglese

Question:
“Sons of Gondor! Of Rohan! My brothers. I see in your eyes the same fear that (a)…… take the heart of me. Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (c)?
Correct Answer Message: Questa è infatti l’unica opzione che propone il corretto plurale di "wolf", che è irregolare.
Subject: Inglese

Question:
“Sons of Gondor! Of Rohan! My brothers. I see in your eyes the same fear that (a)…… take the heart of me. A day (b)…. come when the courage of Men fails, when we forsake our friends and break all bonds of fellowship, but it is not this day. An hour of (c)….. and shattered shields when the Age of Men comes crashing down, but it is not this day! This day we (d)…..! (e) …… all that you hold dear on this good earth, I bid you stand, Men of the West!” (Da Il Signore degli Anelli - Il Ritorno del Re, 2004, Peter Jackson) 
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (d)?
Correct Answer Message: "This day" suggerisce che il tempo verbale da inserire debba essere un presente, quindi si escludono la A e la C (quest'ultima propone una forma che non è grammaticalmente corretta). Anche la E va esclusa perché manca l'ausiliare essere per costruire il present continuous. Il tempo verbale adatto al contesto è il present simple, presente alle opzioni B e D, in questa seconda opzione tuttavia il verbo è coniugato alla terza persona singolare mentre nel testo il soggetto è in prima persona plurale, perciò questa opzione si deve escludere.
Subject: Inglese

Question:
“Sons of Gondor! Of Rohan! My brothers. I see in your eyes the same fear that (a)…… take the heart of me. A day (b)…. come when the courage of Men fails, when we forsake our friends and break all bonds of fellowship, but it is not this day. An hour of (c)….. and shattered shields when the Age of Men comes crashing down, but it is not this day! This day we (d)…..! (e) …… all that you hold dear on this good earth, I bid you stand, Men of the West!” (Da Il Signore degli Anelli - Il Ritorno del Re, 2004, Peter Jackson) 
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (e)?
Correct Answer Message: Il testo richiede che si inserisca una preposizione che renda la frase di senso compiuto e che dia un significato di “per, in nome di” e in questo caso l’unica opzione che si adatta a questa forma è “by”, nell’opzione E. Le prime due alternative si possono subito escludere, perché non si accosta quasi mai "the" ad "all". Dal momento che nella prima parte di questa frase manca un verbo, risultano non adatte anche la C e la D.
Subject: Inglese

Question:
I (a) ……last Tuesday reviewing evidence from a Myanmar women’s group for submission to the U.K. Foreign Affairs Committee’s inquiry into the Myanmar crisis. Just reading about the atrocities committed by military forces meant I slept (b)…… that night. Nearly 50 women have (c)…… in the protests so far, and around 800 women have been arrested. Sixty percent of the people involved in the Civil Disobedience Movement, a peaceful protest designed to (d) …… down the country, are women, and they continue to (e)….. sexual violence, harassment, abuse, and threats from the junta. (Da time.com “Myanmar's Women Are Fighting for a New Future After a Long History of Military Oppression”) 
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (a)?
Correct Answer Message: La frase da completare è impostata in un tempo passato definito (“last Tuesday”), perciò il verbo deve necessariamente essere coniugato al past simple. Si escludono le opzioni A, B ed E perché propongono dei verbi al present simple. Si deve escludere anche l’opzione D, con cui il tempo verbale sarebbe un present perfect continuous ("have been reviewing"), ma nel testo "have been" è separato da "reviewing", in più questo tempo verbale è adottato quando l'azione in questione è cominciata nel passato e continua tutt'ora nel presente.
Subject: Inglese

Question:
I (a) ……last Tuesday reviewing evidence from a Myanmar women’s group for submission to the U.K. Foreign Affairs Committee’s inquiry into the Myanmar crisis. Just reading about the atrocities committed by military forces meant I slept (b)…… that night. Nearly 50 women have (c)…… in the protests so far, and around 800 women have been arrested. Sixty percent of the people involved in the Civil Disobedience Movement, a peaceful protest designed to (d) …… down the country, are women, and they continue to (e)….. sexual violence, harassment, abuse, and threats from the junta. (Da time.com “Myanmar's Women Are Fighting for a New Future After a Long History of Military Oppression”) 
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (b)?
Correct Answer Message: Dal momento che lo spazio segue un verbo, per completare la frase serve inserire un avverbio, qui proposto alle opzioni D ("male") ed E ("profondamente"). Tra queste, analizzandone il significato, l’unica adatta al contesto è la D.
Subject: Inglese

Question:
I (a) ……last Tuesday reviewing evidence from a Myanmar women’s group for submission to the U.K. Foreign Affairs Committee’s inquiry into the Myanmar crisis. Just reading about the atrocities committed by military forces meant I slept (b)…… that night. Nearly 50 women have (c)…… in the protests so far, and around 800 women have been arrested. Sixty percent of the people involved in the Civil Disobedience Movement, a peaceful protest designed to (d) …… down the country, are women, and they continue to (e)….. sexual violence, harassment, abuse, and threats from the junta. (Da time.com “Myanmar's Women Are Fighting for a New Future After a Long History of Military Oppression”) 
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (c)?
Correct Answer Message: Si intuisce che viene richiesta una forma passiva del verbo “to kill”, quindi va esclusa la E, unica alternativa a proporre una forma attiva. Essendo già presente la prima parte del predicato “have”, serve inserire la seconda parte per completare il verbo coniugato al present perfect: "been" e il participio passato del verbo. Solo la A risulta essere grammaticalmente corretta.
Subject: Inglese

Question:
I (a) ……last Tuesday reviewing evidence from a Myanmar women’s group for submission to the U.K. Foreign Affairs Committee’s inquiry into the Myanmar crisis. Just reading about the atrocities committed by military forces meant I slept (b)…… that night. Nearly 50 women have (c)…… in the protests so far, and around 800 women have been arrested. Sixty percent of the people involved in the Civil Disobedience Movement, a peaceful protest designed to (d) …… down the country, are women, and they continue to (e)….. sexual violence, harassment, abuse, and threats from the junta. (Da time.com “Myanmar's Women Are Fighting for a New Future After a Long History of Military Oppression”) 
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (d)?
Correct Answer Message: Per completare la frase si deve inserire un verbo che con l’aggettivo “down” formi un phrasal verb. Si analizzano quindi i significati delle opzioni e si sceglie quello adatto al contesto: "quiet down" = "calmarsi", "take down" = "distruggere"/"sconfiggere", "be down" = "essere tramontato"/"essere a terra", "hold down" = "tenersi"/"tenere giù", "shut down" = "chiudere"/"bloccare". Quest’ultimo è l’unico corretto (E).
Subject: Inglese

Question:
I (a) ……last Tuesday reviewing evidence from a Myanmar women’s group for submission to the U.K. Foreign Affairs Committee’s inquiry into the Myanmar crisis. Just reading about the atrocities committed by military forces meant I slept (b)…… that night. Nearly 50 women have (c)…… in the protests so far, and around 800 women have been arrested. Sixty percent of the people involved in the Civil Disobedience Movement, a peaceful protest designed to (d) …… down the country, are women, and they continue to (e)….. sexual violence, harassment, abuse, and threats from the junta. (Da time.com “Myanmar's Women Are Fighting for a New Future After a Long History of Military Oppression”) 
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (e)?
Correct Answer Message: Si parta osservando la frase da completare: essendo presente un “to”, si può intuire come sia necessario inserire un verbo al tempo infinito, quindi si esclude subito l’opzione D, che propone un past simple. Si analizzano poi i significati e il contesto a cui si devono adattare: gli unici adatti sono “face” e “deal”, quest’ultimo tuttavia, privo dell’avverbio “with”, assume un significato diverso, cioè “accordo”. L’unica opzione adatta è quindi la B, che significa "affrontare".
Subject: Inglese

Question:
There are many reasons to doubt that these numbers will improve any time (a)….., especially given new waves of high-profile police killings, local legislation to protect police, and another reversal in public opinion (b)…… Black Lives Matter. Some activists see no change in police use of force in their city. But others say that many of their proposed reforms are slowly being implemented across the country with positive results—and that Floyd’s death will continue to (c)….. an impact on policy and perception for years to come. “A lot of things are just rolling (d) …… : we didn’t get here in a year and it’s not going to be finished in a year,” says Tracie Keesee, the co-founder and Senior Vice President of Justice Initiatives at the Center for Policing Equity. “You do see some movement—but it all highlights how complex this is, and how (e) …… work truly still needs to be done.” (Da time.com “People Expected Police Behavior to Change After George Floyd’s Murder. The Numbers Tell a Different Story” 13/05/2021)
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (a)?
Correct Answer Message: Nella frase è necessario inserire un avverbio di tempo, qui proposto da tutte le opzioni: tuttavia, l'unico scritto nella forma che si adatta il testo è “soon”, senza l’inserimento di “as” prima o dopo di esso ("as soon" dovrebbe essere seguito da un altro "as" e da un termine di paragone).
Subject: Inglese

Question:
There are many reasons to doubt that these numbers will improve any time (a)….., especially given new waves of high-profile police killings, local legislation to protect police, and another reversal in public opinion (b)…… Black Lives Matter. Some activists see no change in police use of force in their city. But others say that many of their proposed reforms are slowly being implemented across the country with positive results—and that Floyd’s death will continue to (c)….. an impact on policy and perception for years to come. “A lot of things are just rolling (d) …… : we didn’t get here in a year and it’s not going to be finished in a year,” says Tracie Keesee, the co-founder and Senior Vice President of Justice Initiatives at the Center for Policing Equity. “You do see some movement—but it all highlights how complex this is, and how (e) …… work truly still needs to be done.” (Da time.com “People Expected Police Behavior to Change After George Floyd’s Murder. The Numbers Tell a Different Story” 13/05/2021)
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (b)?
Correct Answer Message: Per esprimere il concetto di “riguardo a", "per quanto riguarda”, l’unica opzione corretta è “regarding”: le altre non sono adatte per il tempo verbale adottato o la persona a cui è stato coniugato il verbo.
Subject: Inglese

Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (c)?
Correct Answer Message: Si parta osservando la frase da completare: essendo presente nel testo un “to”, si può intuire che è necessario inserire un verbo al tempo infinito, quindi si escludono tutte le opzioni tranne la D.
Subject: Inglese

Question:

The Numbers Tell a Different Story” 13/05/2021)
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (d)?
Correct Answer Message: Per completare la frase si deve inserire un elemento che con il verbo “rolling” formi un phrasal verb dal senso coerente col testo. Si analizzano quindi i significati delle opzioni e si sceglie quello adatto al contesto: l’unica opzione corretta è la C, che col verbo "roll" assume il significato di “venir fuori", "uscire”, in riferimento a concetti e ideali nuovi.
Subject: Inglese

Question:
There are many reasons to doubt that these numbers will improve any time (a)….., especially given new waves of high-profile police killings, local legislation to protect police, and another reversal in public opinion (b)…… Black Lives Matter. Some activists see no change in police use of force in their city. The Numbers Tell a Different Story” 13/05/2021)
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (e)?
Correct Answer Message: Per indicare il concetto di quantità si possono utilizzare due forme: "how much" e "how many". Questa seconda forma si adotta tuttavia solo per sostantivi plurali e numerabili: essendo invece "work" un sostantivo non numerabile, si comprende che la forma da impiegare sia quella indicata dall'alternativa E: "how much".
Subject: Inglese

Question:
But supermarkets and grocers are (a)…… to sit up and take notice. In response (b)…… growing consumer backlash against the huge amounts of plastic waste generated by plastic packaging, some of the largest UK supermarkets have signed (c)…… to a pact promising to transform packaging and cut plastic wastage. In a pledge to reuse, recycle or compost all plastic (d)……. by 2025, supermarkets are now beginning to take some responsibility for the part they play in (e)…….. to the damage to our environment, with one major supermarket announcing their plan to eliminate all plastic packaging in their own-brand products by 2023. (Da learnenglish.britishcounsil.com) 
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (a)?
Correct Answer Message: In questa frase, per via della presenza del verbo essere a precedere lo spazio vuoto, si deduce che il verbo da inserire debba essere nella forma -ing, presente solo nell’opzione D.
Subject: Inglese

Question:
But supermarkets and grocers are (a)…… to sit up and take notice. In response (b)…… growing consumer backlash against the huge amounts of plastic waste generated by plastic packaging, some of the largest UK supermarkets have signed (c)…… to a pact promising to transform packaging and cut plastic wastage. In a pledge to reuse, recycle or compost all plastic (d)……. by 2025, supermarkets are now beginning to take some responsibility for the part they play in (e)…….. to the damage to our environment, with one major supermarket announcing their plan to eliminate all plastic packaging in their own-brand products by 2023. (Da learnenglish.britishcounsil.com) 
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (b)?
Correct Answer Message: L’opzione presenta infatti l’unica preposizione che può seguire correttamente "in response".
Subject: Inglese

Question:
But supermarkets and grocers are (a)…… to sit up and take notice. In response (b)…… growing consumer backlash against the huge amounts of plastic waste generated by plastic packaging, some of the largest UK supermarkets have signed (c)…… to a pact promising to transform packaging and cut plastic wastage. In a pledge to reuse, recycle or compost all plastic (d)……. by 2025, supermarkets are now beginning to take some responsibility for the part they play in (e)…….. to the damage to our environment, with one major supermarket announcing their plan to eliminate all plastic packaging in their own-brand products by 2023. (Da learnenglish.britishcounsil.com) 
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (c)?
Correct Answer Message: Per completare il verbo, e renderlo così un phrasal verb, si deve scegliere una delle preposizioni sopra proposte, si analizza quindi il significato di ognuna di essa per valutare quale sia adatta al contesto. Le varie opzioni con il verbo significano: “firmare qui"/"insegna (n)”, “iscriversi, sottoscrivere”, “firmare, registrarsi”, “cedere” e “firmare con”. Quella più adatta è la B, con cui la frase assume il significato di “hanno sottoscritto un patto”.
Subject: Inglese

Question:
But supermarkets and grocers are (a)…… to sit up and take notice. In response (b)…… growing consumer backlash against the huge amounts of plastic waste generated by plastic packaging, some of the largest UK supermarkets have signed (c)…… to a pact promising to transform packaging and cut plastic wastage. (Da learnenglish.britishcounsil.com) 
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (d)?
Correct Answer Message: La frase si completa con l’inserimento di un sostantivo, proposto all’opzione E, col significato di “scarto”.
Subject: Inglese

Question:

In a pledge to reuse, recycle or compost all plastic (d)……. by 2025, supermarkets are now beginning to take some responsibility for the part they play in (e)…….. to the damage to our environment, with one major supermarket announcing their plan to eliminate all plastic packaging in their own-brand products by 2023. (Da learnenglish.britishcounsil.com) 
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (e)?
Correct Answer Message: La frase si completa con l’inserimento di un verbo nella forma -ing, data anche la presenza della preposizione “in”,
Subject: Inglese

Question:
As for news stories that make us think the world is an increasingly violent place, there is cause for some optimism (a)……  . (b)….. the end of World War II and 1990, there were 30 wars that killed more than 100,000 people. Today there are still civil wars, but countries are mostly co-existing more peacefully than in the past. (c)……, terrorism has (d)….. in the last few years and, since World War II, wars have killed many more civilians than soldiers. Even for civilians, though, the statistics are not all bad. Although deaths are nine times more (e)…… to be a result of violent crime than political conflict, the global murder rate fell slightly, from 8 per 100,000 people in 2000 to about 5.3 in 2015.(Da learnenglish.britishcounsil.com) 
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (a)?
Correct Answer Message: Nella frase serve inserire un avverbio che abbia significato di aggiunta. L’unica opzione adatta è “too”, nell'opzione E, che può essere inserita alla fine della frase proposta.
Subject: Inglese

Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (b)?
Correct Answer Message: Nella frase si deve inserire un avverbio che indichi uno spazio temporale di cui si conoscono i limiti (la fine della seconda guerra mondiale e il 1990), quello corretto è quindi “between”.
Subject: Inglese

Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (c)?
Correct Answer Message: L’unico avverbio adatto al contesto è “however” che tradotto in questo contesto significa “comunque", "tuttavia”. Le altre opzioni significano rispettivamente "infatti", "mentre", "nonostante", "anche se" (quest'ultimo, "though", assume il significato di "comunque" se si trova alla fine della frase).

Question:

Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (d)?
Correct Answer Message: Per completare la frase, si analizza subito il tempo verbale: essendoci un “has” a precedere lo spazio vuoto e dovendo inserire un verbo, si intuisce come il tempo verbale che si può costituire sia un present perfect, formato con have + participio passato. Tuttavia, solo il significato presente nell'alternativa D è adatto al contesto: "shoot up" (al passato "shot up") vuol dire infatti "crescere", mentre "shoot down" (al passato "shot down") vuol dire "abbattere".
Subject: Inglese

Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (e)?
Correct Answer Message: Per completare la frase si deve inserire un avverbio che conferisca un significato adatto e che sia compatibile con la presenza di “more” a precederlo. L’unico avverbio adeguato è presente nell'opzione B, con cui la frase tradotta è: "Nonostante le morti abbiano una probabilità maggiore di nove volte di essere il risultato di...".
Subject: Inglese

Question:
This stark difference in opinion over something that could be conceived as minor and thus easily (a)…… goes to show that we often attach meaning to even the most mundane practices. When things that we are used to are done differently, it (b)…… spark the strongest reactions in us. (c)….. many Continental Europeans and Latin Americans prefer to be addressed with a title, for example Mr or Ms and their surname when meeting someone in a business context for the first time, Americans, and increasingly the British, now tend to prefer using their first names. The (d)…… thing to do is to listen and observe how your conversation partner addresses you and, if you are still unsure, do not be afraid to ask them how they (e)…… like to be addressed. (Da learnenglish.britishcounsil.com) 
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (a)?
Correct Answer Message: La frase richiede l’inserimento di un participio passato, assente solo nell'alternativa C, che può quindi subito essere scartata. Dal senso della frase si comprende che il verbo da inserire debba avere il significato di "trascurato" e "ignorato" (la risposta E è quindi errata perché il suo signficato è proprio il contrario: può essere tadotto con "guardato" o "controllato") che in inglese si traduce con "overlooked" (Risposta B errata). L'alternativa D presenta un phrasal verb esistente ("to look over" = esaminare, analizzare), dal significato però incongruente con il resto della frase.
Subject: Inglese

Correct Answer Message: Il contesto della frase proposta necessita infatti di un verbo al condizionale, da costruire con un modale. L'unica alternativa che non propone un modale è la B, da scartare. Va esclusa anche la A perché "may have" deve essere seguito da un participio passato, ma nella frase è presente "like" alla forma base. Dei verbi modali proposti dalle restanti alternative, solo "would" è corretto.
Subject: Inglese

Question:
Having an increased (a)…… of the possible differences in expectations and behaviour can help us avoid cases of miscommunication, but it is vital that we also remember that cultural stereotypes can be detrimental to building good business relationships. (b)….. national cultures (c)…. play a part in shaping the way we behave and think, we are also largely influenced by the region we come from, the communities we (d)……, our age and gender, our corporate culture and our individual experiences of the world. The knowledge of the potential differences should therefore be something we keep at the back of our minds, (e)……. something that we use to pigeonhole the individuals of an entire nation. (Da learnenglish.britishcounsil.com) 
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (a)?
Correct Answer Message: La frase si completa con l’inserimento di un sostantivo, qui proposto solo all’opzione D, che tradotto significa “consapevolezza”.
Subject: Inglese

Subject: Inglese

Question:
Next, the hero overcomes obstacles on the way to facing their greatest challenge. There often comes a moment when they face death or loss and that experience gives them the (a)……. to finally defeat the enemy. Luke (b)……… his mentor when he sees Darth Vader kill Obi-Wan, which helps him find the strength he needs later on. When heroes succeed, they return from the special world, changed by their experiences forever. Luke's change comes when he remembers Obi-Wan’s (c)……., 'Use the force', and he uses it to help him aim his laser into the heart of the Death Star. Luke takes his first steps to becoming a Jedi, and the hero (d)…… restarts in The Return of the Jedi, except this time (e)…… mentor is Yoda. (Da learnenglish.britishcounsil.com) 
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (a)?
Correct Answer Message: L'elemento da inserire è il sostantivo "forza" ("strength"), scritto correttamente solo nell'alternativa C. Le opzioni A e B sono errate perché propongono un aggettivo, mentre la E un verbo ("rafforzare").
Subject: Inglese

Question:
The two men looked (a)……. the northern end of the property. It stretched as far as the eye could see. Even the fences were barely visible from where they stood. However bored and rebellious a teenage boy (b)……. get, it wasn't possible to escape on foot. Sam looked at the (c)……. of the horses, kicking at the ground with its heavy hooves. (d)……. the boy ride? he wondered. There was a whole load of trouble a good rider could get into out here, miles away from anyone. But maybe there was even more trouble for someone who knew nothing about horses and wanted to (e)……. from his father. (Da learnenglish.britishcounsil.com) 
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (a)?
Correct Answer Message: Le altre preposizioni proposte infatti non si adattano alla frase da completare. L’opzione D è, inoltre, scritta in modo errato.

Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (e)?
Correct Answer Message: Tutte le opzioni proposte presentano phrasal verbs, si devono perció analizzare i loro significati. Le opzioni A, B e C presentano differenti tempi verbali della forma “get away” che significa letteralmente “scappare” o “fuggire”. Anche le opzioni D ed E presentano il verbo "to get", ma seguito dalla preposizione "on": "to get on", che può significare “andare d’accordo” ma anche “andare avanti, procedere”. Dato il significato quindi si considerano solo le prime tre opzioni e, valutando il tempo verbale migliore, si deve adottare una forma all’infinito, presente solo nell’opzione A.
Subject: Inglese

Question:
The rover analyses the air around it (a)…….., and in 2014 it found the air contained another of the most basic organic molecules and a key ingredient of natural gas: methane. One of the (b)…… of methane is that it only survives a few hundred years. This means that something, somewhere on Mars, is replenishing the supply. (c)…….. NASA, Mars emits thousands of tons of methane at a time. The level of methane rises and (d)…… at seasonal intervals in the year, almost (e)……the planet is breathing it. (Da learnenglish.britishcounsil.com) 
Which of the following words correctly completes the blank space marked with the letter (a)?
Correct Answer Message: In questa frase è necessario inserire un avverbio di tempo, presenti solo nelle opzioni D ed E. Quest’ultima alternativa non si adatta tuttavia al contesto presentato.
Subject: Inglese
